description: Engineered and managed feed management software for Google, Amazon, and Etsy, processing 10 million product updates daily and supporting over 10,000 Shopify stores. Implemented AI-powered optimization features for product titles, details, highlights, and descriptions, driving a 30% increase in sales for Shopify merchants. Built a Feed Management Shopify App for Etsy from the ground up, integrating backend APIs using Python and Django, and developing UI with JavaScript and React. Developed conversion tracking applications, enhancing visibility and performance metrics for Google Ads and Facebook Ads.

Automated web scraping processes to efficiently extract business-critical data. Implemented a web crawler to automatically identify and scrape links from websites to find expired domains, increasing the identification rate of valuable expired domains by 70%.
